title: Pure.ISO With Crack
description:
INSTALLING THE GAME
---------------------------------------------------------

1. Use The ISO file to Daemon Tools.

2. Install The Game.

3. Copy The Pure.exe And fmodex.dll (CrackForPure.rar) To The Install Directory.

4. Play Game And Enjoy!

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Product Features
-------------------------------------------------------------
   
    
 * Choose among a variety of male and female character riders
   
 * Race against deft A.I. opponents or online players (up to 16-player     
      multiplayer)
   
 * Take part in frenetic races and freestyle competitions all over the world
  
 
 * Developed by award winning development team Black Rock
  
 
 * Pro rider Wes Miller, founder of H-Bomb Films, known for showcasing his 
      team's incredible stunts is advisor to the development team to assure 
      the   game adheres to the sport's culture and authenticity but stillallows   
      creative liberties





-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Minimum system requirements:

-PC Processor Type:

-Intel Pentium 4 processor, AMD Athlon processor

-PC Processor Speed:

-2GHz

-PC Operating System:

-Windows Vista, Windows XP

-PC System Memory:

-1GB RAM

-PC Hard Drive Space:

-3GB

-PC Video:

-128MB DirectX 9.0c-compatible 3D video card supporting Shaders 3.0

-PC Sound Card:

-DirectX 9.0c-compatible sound card

-PC Drive Type and Speed:

-DVD-ROM 8x
